content.body: One of the people who I consulted with for anti racism training (and who I went to HS with) is hosting a workshop titled "Developing your anti-racist: doing the inner work" on July 8. Cost is $52 with fees. Thought people here might be interested: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/developing-your-anti-racist-heart-doing-the-inner-work-tickets-662844895927
